#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int a[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
		}
		sort(a,a+n);
		int i=0,j=n-1;
	while(i<j)
	{
		cout<<a[j]<<" ";
		j--;
		if(j==i)
		break;
		cout<<a[i]<<" ";
		i++;
		if(i==j)
		break;
	}
	if(n%2==0)
	cout<<a[n/2-1]<<endl;
	else
	cout<<a[n/2]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
